title: DBMS Level 3 â€” Keys & Relational Model
intro: This level introduces the relational model, keys, and basic integrity constraints.
points: Understand relation (table), tuple (row), attribute (column), and domain.
Different types of keys: super key, candidate key, primary key, alternate key, foreign key.
Entity integrity constraint (primary key cannot be NULL).
Referential integrity constraint (foreign key references primary key in another table).
Basic idea of schema vs instance of a relation.
